protein.specific_function: Binds to heparin. Induces cell attachment and spreading and plays a role in cell adhesion. May play a role in extracellular matrix mineralization

reference.reference_text: Takeshita S, Kikuno R, Tezuka K, Amann E: Osteoblast-specific factor 2: cloning of a putative bone adhesion protein with homology with the insect protein fasciclin I. Biochem J. 1993 Aug 15;294 ( Pt 1):271-8.
